data.title: Selena Quintanilla News 2013
data.text:
Selena Portrait Doll Cancelled

Breaking Selena news: The Selena Portrait Doll by The Danbury Mint is No Longer Available.

No Further Details.

Like: Selena Forever and be updated on all Selena News!

posted 6-26-13

Techno Cumbia on La Voz Kids

Last Night on La Voz Kids; Team Rubio: Alondra, Yensid y Alexis sing Techno Cumbia by Selena

It's awesome to see soo many young ones know who Selena is and her memory keeps growing for generations to come.

posted 6-17-13

50 Years Strong

Congrats to Mr. & Mrs. Quintanilla on their 50th Anniversary!

"HAPPY 50th Anniversary to my parents! They have given so much of themselves to not only each other, but to all 3 of us.

To my mother who is all heart and who is my best friend and who is someone I can always come to and always knows what to say to ease whatever I'm feeling....

To my father who is always my protector and whom I admire he's passion for what he believes in.

Tonight we will celebrate with Selena in our hearts." -Suzette Quntanilla

posted 6-8-13

Singer Yuridia Honors Selena

Yuridia kicked off her tour in Mexicali, Mx. with a special tribute to Selena.

Selena featured in "American Sabor"

Selena is one of the artist featured in "American Sabor" a traveling exhibition currently in New York.

That is why we created a new page on our website with all the details, touring dates and photos:

posted 5-7-13

The Selena Portrait Doll

Now, you can own a spectacular tribute to this legendary Latina as she appeared on the memorable evening of the 1994 Grammy Awards.

Our skilled artisans have replicated Selena's ensemble down to the very last detail.

Her glimmering white gown, set with crystal beads, has been hand-tailored and features all the touches that made the original gown so spellbinding.

We've also expertly re-created her stylish evening shoes and accessories.

The result is an elegant porcelain sculpture that radiates with Selena's strength and beauty.

Advance reservations now being accepted for Winter delivery.

Actual size is 16" in height.

Image shown is an artist's rendering. Actual doll may vary.

Q Productions, Inc., under license from The Selena Brand

price: $159.00 plus $9.00 shipping and service

Payable in four monthly installments of just $42.00

The Families of Latin Legends Selena and Jenni Rivera Meet at Fiesta Broadway in Los Angeles

Words from AB

"The first song I learned on the bass was "La Bamba". I never dreamed it would take me on a wild ride!!!

I love you guys for allowing our Family to be part of your lives!!!

To see you guys smiling puts a smile on my face!" - A.B. Quintanilla

Como La Flor on The Voice

The Voice contestant; Mary Miranda performs Como La Flor by Selena.

Buy Mary's rendition of "Como La Flor" on iTunes

The Voice contestant Mary Miranda is a Selena fan!

Here she is again performing another Selena classic, Bidi Bidi Bom Bom

this time for Jenni Rivera on Spanish talent show "Tengo Mucho Talento"

posted 4-9-13

Selena Fun Fact

We were so poor Selena and Suzette wore the same shirt for school pictures! Lol!!!!

We used to buy our clothes at Weiners and shoes at Pay-less!!!

Dad wanted us to make one pair of shoes last all year long!!!!

How do you make shoes that are made out of fake leather last???? Barrio Fabulous Baby!!!!

shared by: A.B. Quintanilla

posted 4-9-13

Music Choice Celebrates the Legacy of Selena Quintanilla Perez

Music Choice, the multi-platform video and music network, will celebrate the life and legacy of SELENA now through April 14, 2013.

MC On Demand will feature popular Selena music videos, live concert footage and behind the scenes extras

in a special category entitled Haciendo un ClÃ¡sico On Demand. (Hashtag #MCLatino)

Highlights include:

ÂSelena Making of the Album Â which features artists including Selena Gomez, Cristian Castro, and Samo from Camila along with music producers

she worked who explain their part in the creation of the ÂEnamorada De TiÂ album.

ÂRemembering Selena - which features rare interview clips, live performances and behind the scenes footage.

ÂPopular Selena Music Videos - ÂAmor ProhibidoÂ, ÂBidi Bidi Bom BomÂ, ÂDreaming of YouÂ, ÂI Could Fall In LoveÂ, ÂNo Me Queda MasÂ.

MC Music Channels will also feature her extensively on its MC Tropicales, MC Pop Latino, MC Romances, MC Mexicana and MC Musica Urbana Music Channels.

From No Duh (tribute to No Doubt), Believe (Tribute to Cher), Shania Twin (Tribute to Shania Twain) to Spice (tribute to Spice Girls)

and everyone in between... Soon there will be... Como La Flor... A tribute to Selena!

posted 4-4-13

Family Is Everything

Taping for a special MUNDOFOX will air soon!!

-Suzette Quintanilla Official page

posted 4-4-13

Today in Selena History

April 2, 1992 at the Nueces County Courthouse Chris and Selena were married.

"I had nothing to wear but a T-shirt and jeans; Selena was wearing a skirt and boots." - Chris Perez

"For me, the most important is love because I know it will last for the rest of my life" - Selena

They will forever be linked by love such as Lucy and Ricky, Elvis and Priscilla... Selena and Chris!

posted 4-2-13

Words from Suzette

"Would like to thank you all for posting such beautiful things about Sel. Trying to keep my day as normal as I can.

Not gonna lie its a countdown in my head year after year to the hour and exact time they pronounced her gone....

I'm grateful for my time with my sister and even more so knowing she still lives within us all

and It's not a little, it's ALOT!!!! THAT'S what's freak'n AWESOME!!!

To all: KEEP CALM AND BIDI BIDI BOM BOM!!!! :)"

posted 3-31-13

Selena Fun Fact

Our engineers always carried a special toothbrush to get the lipstick out of the screen on Selena's microphone.

If you go to the museum the mic is on display and you can see her lipstick on the mic, still."

shared by: A.B. Quintanilla

posted 3-31-13

Check out our "Remembering Selena; 18 years later" page

posted 3-30-13

Words from A.B. 3

"I want to thank everyone that continue to keep Selena's memory alive by showing love for her 18yrs later.

It means a lot to me and makes me proud that I was given the honor to make the music that she sang that has made her the beautiful Legend she is today!!!!

Songs are just a beat, some notes and chords until someone special sings it and brings it to life! Selena was and continues to be that someone special!"

posted 3-29-13

Extra Extra!!

"As of today we WILL BE ALLOWING CAMERAS IN THE #SELENA MUSEUM!

So u can now take pictures next to her beautiful outfits! NO FLASH PHOTOGRAPHY OR VIDEO TAPING IS ALLOWED" - Suzette Quintanilla Official page

posted 3-25-13

Selena Visa Prepaid Card Closure

Effective March 22, 2013, we will be closing the card program.

What this means to you - your card will be valid for use through April 21, 2013.

On Monday, April 22, 2013, all cards will be disabled and all card accounts will be closed.

Prior to April 22, 2013, you have three options for obtaining your funds:

1. You can spend down the remaining funds on your card. Keep in mind that you can always get

cash with your card at any retail location offering cash back with PIN/debit purchases, or use an ATM to withdraw funds.

2. You can be issued a new PaycardUSA Prepaid MasterCardÂ® payroll card,

which will require that you have your employer make partial or complete payroll direct deposits to your card.

Please call cardholder services at 1-888-818-8812 for more information.

3. Funds can be returned via check to the address on file for your card account.

Should you choose the 2nd or 3rd option, please contact cardholder services via email at cs@mfundsglobal.com or call toll-free 1-888-818-8812

to arrange for card or check issuance.

If we receive no contact from you by Sunday, April 21, 2013, your card account will be closed

and the remaining funds collected for the account closure fee as listed in your card's terms and conditions.

info was sent via email to all cardholders.

source Mari Salas.

posted 3-22-13

Arizona Fine Artist "El Moises" Paints Selena Quintanilla-PÃ©rez

He chose a purple background because it indicates royalty. Indeed, Selena is a Reina, and she will be forever missed.

We are glad our Chicano Picasso painted her with love in his heart.

source: http://tucsoncitizen.com/hispanic-politico/2013/03/22/el-moises-paints-selena/

posted 3-13-13

Broadway Sings Selena

Former In the Heights cast members Luis Salgado and Gabrielle Ruiz, as well as "Smash" actor Manuel Stark, will celebrate the life of

late Mexican-American artist Selena Quintanilla-PÃ©rez with "Broadway Sings Selena" April 1 at the Underground in New York City.

-

The 7 PM concert Â held on the 18th anniversary of the singer's death Â will feature over 15 of Selena's songs, including

"Como la Flor," "Dreaming of You," "I Could Fall in Love" and "No Me Queda Mas." Performers include

Salgado (Women on The Verge of a Nervous Breakdown, In the Heights), Ruiz (Evita, In the Heights), Stark ("Smash," West Side Story),

Genny Lis Padilla (Off-Broadway's Rent), Desi Oakley (Annie, Wicked), Anthony Lee Medina (Spring Awakening national tour), Jose Sepulveda (Altar Boyz),

Margot B. (Off-Broadway's Rent), Brandon Contreras (In The Heights national tour), Gizel Jimenez (In The Heights Westchester), Tyrone Davis, Jr. (Shrek national tour),

Stephanie Klemons (In The Heights, Bring It On associate choreographer), Danny George (Sister Act national tour), Charles Barksdale (Sister Act national tour),

Victor Legra, David Davila, Hayley Anna Norris, Joshua Gonzales and Jonah Mayor.

-

According to press notes, "Some of Broadway's brightest young talent will sing songs made famous

by Selena Quintanilla-Perez, the queen of Tejano music who was slain on March 31st, 1995.

-

The evening will also feature cast members from the Boston cast of SpeakEasy Stage Company's In The Heights,

including Diego Klock-Perez (Usnavi), Jorge Barranco (Sonny), Alessandra Valea (Vanessa), Sean Jones, Adrian Ruz and Chris Ramirez, among others.

-

Broadway Sings Selena, presented as part of Lone Star Theatre Company's Texas Legends series, is produced by Victor Legra and David Davila with music direction by Addison O'Donnell.

The concert is a benefit for Lone Star's upcoming production of Davila's Adan y Julio, a play about two young men in love who are caught on two different sides of the dangerous Mexican drug war.

-

The Underground is located at 955 West End Avenue.

To reserve tickets, email broadwaysingsselena@gmail.com

For more information, visit TheUndergroundNYC.com.

source: playbill.com

other info: tickets are $20 each and will be sold at the door. Credit or Cash!

there is a $15 food/drink minimum per person, Great food and drinks!

Arrive between 6:15-6:55. they will start releasing reservations 5 minutes prior to allow for waiting list reservations.

posted 3-12-13
